ResourceFeature.Name: Wand of Entangle
ResourceFeature.Text: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast the entangle spell (save DC 13) from it. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

MagicProperty.Requirement: Wand, uncommon (requires attunement by a spellcaster)
